@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

if (playerCommand.equals(“spec”) && p.isDonor == 1) {
if (c.inWild()) {
return;
}
c.gfx100(437);
c.startAnimation(1914);
c.specAmount = 100;
}

item.title: Adding ::Spec for donators
item.dc:creator: @erlasz erlasz
item.description:
@erlasz wrote:

ok so this is what the spec is set for me but i want to make one for donators how do i make it able for donators this is in chars what donator looks like : isDonator = 1

if (playerCommand.equals(“spec”) && c.playerRights >= 3) {
if (c.inWild())
return;
c.gfx100(437);
c.startAnimation(1914);
c.specAmount = 100;
}

i just want this command to work for donators only not normal players
thank you please jhelp
